name: 2022 6th International Conference on Computer, Software and Modeling
content: For papers submitted to ICCSM 2022, we offer the publications as following: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Google Scholar, and other major databases. Some selected papers will be sent to the editorial board of JSW for further review after being extended with at least 40% new content, and accepted papers will be published in Journal of Software, which will be indexed by DBLP, EBSCO, DOAJ, ProQuest, INSPEC, WorldCat, CNKI,etc.
